As someone new to investing, Groww has been a game changer. The stock market insights and mutual fund options are extensive, and the SIP feature has been a great way for me to build wealth steadily. The app's real-time updates and low transaction fees are very impressive. Plus, the investment tracking tools keep me informed about my portfolios performance. If you're looking for a beginner-friendly platform, this is it!

worst app and worst customer service. I have tried to activate the groww demat account since October 10 and all the necessary documents submitted until now it's yet to activated. I contacted them support, they told it will be resolved in 48 hrs and it's 5 th day no resolution. please avoid this app as the customer service is poor

Ive been using Groww for my mutual fund investments, and Im impressed by how easy it is to navigate. The real-time market data and stocks performance insights help me make better investment decisions. The app also offers SIP plans, making it easy to invest without having to time the market. I can track my portfolio's growth and get detailed reports, which helps me stay informed about my financial goals.

Groww's platform is user-friendly, with seamless execution for stock trading and investing. I love the detailed market insights and the ability to trade in equity, derivatives, and mutual funds all in one place. Their customer service is top-notch too, making trading stress-free. If you want to get into stock market investments, Groww is the way to go

I've been using Groww for over a year now, and it's hands down the best stock trading platform. The app is super intuitive, and the equity delivery is a game changer. Their charts and tools for market analysis are spot on. I highly recommend Groww for anyone serious about investing in stocks or mutual funds.

Groww is a standout investment platform in India, offering a seamless experience for both beginners and seasoned investors. The app allows you to invest in stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, digital gold, and even US stocks, all from a single interface. User-Friendly Interface: The onboarding process is quick and intuitive, with minimal financial jargon, making it accessible for first-time investors. The clean design and easy navigation enhance the overall user experience.
